success.title: Payment Confirmed!
success.description: Your subscription has been successfully activated
success.message1: You will receive a confirmation email with all the details of your subscription.
success.message2: Now you can enjoy all the features of your plan!

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.message1: Don't worry! You can return at any time to subscribe to one of our plans.
cancel.message2: If you have any questions about our plans, please contact our support.
